name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new posts in Product Hunt
description:
This template periodically checks for new posts in Product Hunt and uses the retrieved information to create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11lRHKoMor849eNsCwoz5M6fOHxsqc_HzRuWlp8qaTvg/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
